.. :changelog:

History
-------

1.2.0 (2015-04-23)
++++++++++++++++++

* Django 1.7/1.8 compatibility (thanks to @scottwoodall)

1.1.0 (2014-01-30)
++++++++++++++++++

* Refresh code and compatibility
* Wheel distribution
* Add demo at http://easy-pjax.herokuapp.com/
* Drop official support for Django 1.4 (it should still work though)

1.0.0 (2012-05-29)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release
